Description: Solid-cast copper alloy figure of an Oxyrhynchus fish on a hollow rectangular base; attached by ventral and pectoral fins; forked tail; dorsal ridge; tapering nose; hollowed eyes; disc and horn headdress; figure of a priest kneels in front.
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2007/08 Nov-Jan, BM, Room 3, Divine Cat: Speaking to the gods in ancient Egypt
